properties.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity/Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; La Junta Vicinity/Otero County; Crowley County; Colorado Springs Vicinity/Southern El Paso County/Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County/Monument Ridge/Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Las Animas Vicinity/Bent County; Canon City Vicinity/Eastern Fremont County
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 8 at 12:24AM MST until February 8 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Visibility one to two miles in dense fog.

* WHERE...Dense fog was occurring mainly along the Highway 50
corridor from Canon City to Las Animas. Dense fog was also noted
over sections of El Paso county. Several weather stations in
these areas were reporting visibility at or below 1/4 of a mile.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
properties.instruction:
If driving, slow down, use your low beams, and leave plenty of
distance ahead of you.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING
